content: Patient #P-88234 (DOB 03/15/1979) underwent a two-level lumbar fusion on 05/12/2024 at St. Michael's Hospital. The procedure was performed by Dr. Vasquez following 6 months of conservative treatment failure. Post-op recovery included 3 days inpatient stay and referral to Lakeside Rehab facility. Prior authorization was granted under policy #ORTH-2024-45A.
